name: Tricky Tracks (Zane Ronald Talbot)
description:
Description:

Tricky Tracks is a 2-4 player racing game that allows players to mix up the dynamic of the track they race on by placing traps for their opponents. Each lap players will be gifted 6 items they may use to help themselves or throw off their opponent. 

Controls:

Right Trigger: Accelerate

Left Trigger: Decelerate

Left-Analog Stick: Turn left / right

Left / Right Bumpers: Toggle Selected Trap / Item

A Button: Use Trap / Item

Start Button: Pause
